description:
Whether you're getting in your winter ultra training or linking alpine peaks, these provide traction in sub-optimal trail conditions. The hybrid upper pairs a softshell toe cover with an elastomer heel, for a locked-in feel and protection against snow and slush. The stainless steel spikes have been heat treated to withstand corrosion and wear, and the front toe spikes are positioned to provide grip during toe off.

  • Softshell toe cover and elastomer heel tensioner hold traction device securely in place
  • Toe cover provides protection against snow
  • 14 stainless steel spikes provide traction on snow and ice
  • Heel webbing loop for easy on and off
  • Size chart is for use with running shoes. For use with boots, subtract 1 size from the size chart (eg. size 8 shoes, size 7 boots)
name: Black Diamond Distance Spike Traction Devices - Unisex
